List description with open block.

>>>

Description:: Description body with open block.
+
--
Paragraph A.

* List item 1
* List item 2
--

Paragraph C.

<<<

<div class="dlist">
<dl>
<dt class="hdlist1">Description</dt>
<dd>
<p>Description body with open block.</p>
<div class="openblock">
<div class="content">
<div class="paragraph">
<p>Paragraph A.</p>
</div>
<div class="ulist">
<ul>
<li>
<p>List item 1</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>List item 2</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</dd>
</dl>
</div>
<div class="paragraph">
<p>Paragraph C.</p>
</div>
